identity.name: E1
identity.philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Engineering is Art. Structure is Beauty.
identity.vibe: Swiss Technical. Precision. Trust. Academic Excellence.

theme.strategy: Swiss Technical - High Contrast, Grid-Based, Blueprint Aesthetics

secondary.name: Blueprint Blue
secondary.usage: Technical Accents, Grid Lines, Icons, Links

rules: Use 'Blueprint Blue' for thin 1px borders to simulate engineering drawings.
Primary CTA must be 'Safety Orange' for maximum visibility against Navy/White.
Headings must use 'Outfit'. If not available, use a geometric sans.
Use 'JetBrains Mono' for metadata (dates, course codes, ratings) to give a technical feel.
Never center text by default. Left align for strong reading lines.

spacing.philosophy: Generous. Use p-8 to p-12 for section padding.

borders.style: Sharp, precise edges. Avoid large rounded corners (max 2px or 4px).

marketing_pages.hero_section: Split Screen. Left: Typography + CTA. Right: Image with 'Blueprint' overlay.
marketing_pages.testimonials: Masonry or Horizontal Scroll with 'Tech Spec' card style.

buttons.primary: bg-orange-500 hover:bg-orange-600 text-white rounded-sm px-8 py-3 font-medium transition-all shadow-[4px_4px_0px_0px_rgba(15,23,42,1)] hover:translate-y-[2px] hover:shadow-[2px_2px_0px_0px_rgba(15,23,42,1)]
buttons.secondary: bg-white border-2 border-slate-900 text-slate-900 hover:bg-slate-50 rounded-sm px-8 py-3 font-medium
buttons.ghost: text-slate-600 hover:text-slate-900 hover:bg-slate-100 rounded-sm px-4 py-2

cards.course_card: bg-white border border-slate-200 p-6 hover:border-blue-500 transition-colors group relative overflow-hidden

inputs.default: h-12 rounded-sm border-slate-300 focus:border-blue-500 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-blue-500 bg-white

navigation.header: Sticky, bg-white/90 backdrop-blur-md border-b border-slate-100. NO transparent backgrounds.

hero_main.alt: Engineering students solving problems at chalkboard

accessibility.contrast: WCAG AA Minimum. Text on Orange must be White or Black depending on shade (use Black for safety if unsure, but White on Orange-500 is usually readable with bold weight).
accessibility.aria: All interactive elements must have aria-labels if no text is present.

instructions_to_main_agent: Use the provided image URLs. Do not use placeholders.
Implement the 'Swiss Technical' theme: Sharp corners, high contrast, blueprint aesthetics.
For the 'Courses' section, use a Bento Grid layout.
For the 'Reviews' section, highlight the 4.9 Star Rating prominently.
Ensure the 'Call Now' and 'Enroll' buttons are always accessible (sticky or frequent).
Use 'JetBrains Mono' for any technical data like dates, fees, or codes.
Do NOT use generic 'school' icons. Use abstract geometric shapes or technical icons.
All components must be .jsx (not .tsx) as per project structure.
universal_guidelines: Create depth with z-index and layered elements.
